channel.title: Why connects the Gateway to so many weather stations?
channel.description:
i have seen with netstat that the geateway make connection too many different weather stations: 94.155.49.47:https Weather station BUXX0005 - Sofia 78.129.180.14:9001 Weather station UKXX3140 - Bingham 95.215.45.138 Weather station SWXX0007 - Gothenburg 185.96.180.164:https Weather station GMXX0040 - Frankfurt am Main 82.197.218.97:9001 Weather station NLXX0053 - Almere Stad and some more.
**Why are all these connections?** All with SYN_SENT

item.title: Why connects the Gateway to so many weather stations?
item.dc:creator: WhoZero
item.description:
i have seen with netstat that the geateway make connection too many different weather stations:
94.155.49.47:https Weather station BUXX0005 - Sofia
78.129.180.14:9001 Weather station UKXX3140 - Bingham
95.215.45.138 Weather station SWXX0007 - Gothenburg
185.96.180.164:https Weather station GMXX0040 - Frankfurt am Main
82.197.218.97:9001 Weather station NLXX0053 - Almere Stad
and some more.

Why are all these connections? All with SYN_SENT

Read full topic
item.source: Why connects the Gateway to so many weather stations?
